title: FS/FT: 3 tough, low pop. T206 SGC 88's,  Listen to offers
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS/FT: 3 tough, low pop. T206 SGC 88's,  Listen to offers
posts.post_content:
SGC 88 Camnitz (arm at side), SCap 350-460, only 1 PSA 8 of all backs......
SGC 88 Kisinger, SCap 350 fact. 25, only 3 PSA 7's and 1 PSA 8 of all backs..
SGC 88 L. Doyle (batting), SCap 350, borderline HOFer....
See post below....Crazy PSA prices

All three of these cards are strong, especially corners. Scans available, just send me your email, thanks.....

Still available, last PSA 8 sales are....

Camnitz...$11,438 (Memory Lane)
Kisinger...$8550.50 (Goodwin)
Doyle....$3780 (Goodwin)

These cards are fantastic investments for the money, thanks for looking....
Kevin, do you purposely not post scans? Just curious really. Your cards always sound interesting, and I'd enjoy seeing them. Cheers
Cards are still available, entertain offers, thanks..
